extendedInfo.description: The Auraxis Control Center is the app for quick access to your Planetside2 information. With this app you will be able to quickly access information about the servers, your outfit, your profile and your friends profiles. It also includes quick links to some social information such as Twitter and Reddit/r/planetside.NOTE: If you are having problems finding your outfit, make sure your are using the exact Outfit Name including uppercase and lowercase letters. You can input a partial name as long as the first letters match exactly the outfit name.The current features:-View your friends(Paid version)-View your stats(Paid version)-Change your background-Killboard-Search for your character(or characters)-Set a preferred character for quick access -Server status(offline/online)-Search for your outfit(or outfits)-You can also set a preferred outfit-Twitter integration-Reddit integration-Twitter feed from @planetside, @purrfectstorm, @mhigby and @ps2dailydealsThe set of features is limited but I am planning on adding more soon, it all depends on the support of the community. The features I have planned next are:-Vehicle/Weapon Information-Faction population per server-Tablet support-Leaderboards -Live maps-Customizable alerts(deals, friends online, game alerts, etc, Remember this depends more on SOE than on me)Any comment of idea don't doubt on emailing me.All the data is provided by SOE via https://census.soe.com/keywords: planetside, planetside2, auraxis, soe

reviews.title: Simpler to SOE\'s App
reviews.comment: Simpler to use, clean interface, FAST! Much faster than what SOE has. Not as many options than what you get with SOE, but nice for a quick overview. Would pay for it if I could get a better description of what the paid app gives me. I could live with an ad at the bottom or to.
reviews.author: Russ Teicheira

reviews.title: Must have for avid Planetside player
reviews.comment: This app has everything you need to keep up with the game! Loads everything very fast. Can\'t wait to see more!
reviews.author: Daniel Spradau

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Must have app for PS2 for those in an outfit and want to see what friends are online without having to login to the game. It works flawlessly even on my old Sprint Samsung Epic 4g phone.
reviews.author: clinton cameron

reviews.title: Great so far
reviews.comment: That alert idea sounds really good. Please create it and add the option for notifications.The smoothness of this app outshines the terribad app SOE and appburst released, good work
reviews.author: Fahim Kadir

reviews.title: Edit: okay now that is awesome.
reviews.comment: I would pay money for this.
reviews.author: Sheffield Kaelin

reviews.title: Brilliance
reviews.comment: This is a phenomenal mobile companion to Planetside 2. It is noninvasive and beautifully designed to make those familiar with the game feel right at home. It is also swift and optimized for handheld devices.
reviews.author: Sam Stutsman

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Very well created App; excellent addition to Planetside 2 - has a  lot of potential!
reviews.author: Alex Sturmey

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Nice work krm.  Derp and perps.
reviews.author: David Haar

reviews.comment: Great app, I wish we could see alerts in real time.
reviews.author: Kamil Ratajczak

reviews.title: Quick and helpful
reviews.comment: Very fast compared to the other apps.  I think the reddit feature is a nice addition.  Can\'t find my outfit though.
reviews.author: Josiah A

reviews.title: amazing!
reviews.comment: perfectly fluid and fast. for the love of god, if you\'re gonna add animations, make an on/off button or make them perfect as well.  the top right buttons needs fixes.  also, try to copy or base yourself on \"reddit sync\'s design. it\'s the best one I\'ve seen for android.  great job tho, keep it well!
reviews.author: santiago alvarez

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The addition on reddit and Twitter is genius! Even without it its still great. Fast and easy to use and handy when you want to check your stats and stuff.
reviews.author: Robin Low

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Fast, lightweight (compared to the official PS2 app), easy to use, active developer... The list goes on and on. Overall an excellent app!  (PS, if stats are outdated, it\'s not the dev\'s fault, as the data comes from SOE\'s API.)
reviews.author: Daniel Korpi
